transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello haanji
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir main time lo ki shot automation se baat kar raha hun Mumbai se ye Gujarat se Gandhi Dham se
Customer: Baat to hui hai bhai aapko din mein
Customer: Kabhi se mere ko English mein bolna chahiye time kitne time se ye call karo chalu hone ke liye
Executive: Are mere paas hi land hota hai sir customer care ka call
Customer: Mere paas hi aata hai
Executive: Haanji account manager ke paas hi aata hai call
Customer: Abhi kya karenge bolo abhi ye mail ka reply Monday tak hi aa payega kyunki office band hai Saturday Sunday off rehta hai Monday bata paunga main
Customer: Saturday Sunday office close hai
Executive: Ji ji
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know when call will start.

- Customer wants to know about mail reply.



Resolution:

- Executive said customer care calls land with him.

- Executive informed mail reply will come by Monday.

- Executive informed office is closed on Saturday and Sunday.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, mail, office, saturday sunday
